message: Let's start with a fair split, and I'll give you a chance to negotiate
I'll start with a fair split, but I think I deserve a bit more. Your turn to negotiate!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I think I deserve more
I'll take a slightly smaller share to get a deal done. Your turn to think about it!
I'm getting closer to my target, but I'm still willing to compromise
I'll take a big risk and go for a more aggressive split. You can either accept or risk getting nothing!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll try to squeeze a better deal out of you
I'm going all-in, I'll take the majority of the pie. You can either accept or walk away!
I'm not going to accept a deal that leaves me with nothing. I'll take the risk of not getting anything
